name: City Test Driving School & Car Parking Simulator
name_original: City Test Driving School & Car Parking Simulator
description:
Join our master tutor driver and get your license at learning test driving school. Sit in the racing cars and get ready for a test drive. Drive various high performance cars and complete tests at car driving school. Polish your extreme driving skills, learn advanced car controls and drift racing for fun.


Follow traffic signal rules, wait for green light, use proper indicator at modern car driving school. Carefully ride motorcar using proper indicators and following traffic lights. Appreciate drifting sports car like an outrageous racer in road hustling; abstain from hitting vehicles on city street and stop auto decisively at test stopping zone.

Features:

Experience real city driving school game
Take out multiple cars in real city traffic
Enjoy ultimate car parking challenges
Well designed testing paths for professional driver training
Realistic auto physics & smooth accelerator and brake controls
Amazing 3D graphics


Download newest 3d parking school game. Go crazy round the real city traffic showing extreme drifting and stunts.
